long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an in-browser notification alert for users of the one-a-day photo sharing site 365project.org.

When you receive a new notification on the 365project.org site, the extension icon will change colour to alert you to this.  It will also optionally display a pop-up alert and play a notification sound.  You may view your latest notifications by clicking on the icon.

This extension is in no way affiliated or supported by 365project.org.
